message.content:
Based on the given information, the most likely category for this paper would be "Toys & Games" (7) because it describes a simulation game where the player can build and manage a school. 

The second likely category would be "Software" (15) as the paper is about a computer game.

The third likely category would be "Video Games" (16) as it is a specific subset of the "Toys & Games" category.

The fourth likely category would be "Books" (5) as it could potentially be a guidebook or strategy book for the game.

The fifth likely category would be "Office & School Supplies" (37) as it relates to the theme of running a school.

prompt:
Title: NA
Content: Run your school any way you want to inSchool Tycoon.Build your school, complete with dormitories, classrooms, library, administration offices and athletic facilities. Populate the school with teachers, and attract students to your new institution of higher learning. Upgrade the cafeteria, improve the landscaping, and add entertainment options to increase your popularity with the students. Check up on your students and make sure they are learning or it’s off to the detention center.Construct...

Give 5 likely categories as a comma-separated list ordered from most to least likely, and provide your reasoning.
